sequence.help: Used to order the 'All Operations' kanban view
sequence.name: sequence

default_location_src_id.help: This is the default source location when you create a picking manually with this operation type. It is possible however to change it or that the routes put another location. If it is empty, it will check for the supplier location on the partner.
default_location_src_id.name: default_location_src_id

default_location_dest_id.help: This is the default destination location when you create a picking manually with this operation type. It is possible however to change it or that the routes put another location. If it is empty, it will check for the customer location on the partner.
default_location_dest_id.name: default_location_dest_id

show_entire_packs.help: If ticked, you will be able to select entire packages to move
show_entire_packs.name: show_entire_packs

use_create_lots.help: If this is checked only, it will suppose you want to create new Lots/Serial Numbers, so you can provide them in a text field.
use_create_lots.name: use_create_lots

use_existing_lots.help: If this is checked, you will be able to choose the Lots/Serial Numbers. You can also decide to not put lots in this operation type.  This means it will create stock with no lot or not put a restriction on the lot taken.
use_existing_lots.name: use_existing_lots

print_label.help: If this checkbox is ticked, label will be print in this operation.
print_label.name: print_label

show_operations.help: If this checkbox is ticked, the pickings lines will represent detailed stock operations. If not, the picking lines will represent an aggregate of detailed stock operations.
show_operations.name: show_operations

show_reserved.help: If this checkbox is ticked, Odoo will automatically pre-fill the detailed operations with the corresponding products, locations and lot/serial numbers.
show_reserved.name: show_reserved

reservation_method.help: How products in transfers of this operation type should be reserved.
reservation_method.name: reservation_method

reservation_days_before.help: Maximum number of days before scheduled date that products should be reserved.
reservation_days_before.name: reservation_days_before

reservation_days_before_priority.help: Maximum number of days before scheduled date that priority picking products should be reserved.
reservation_days_before_priority.name: reservation_days_before_priority
